name: Dungeon X Dungeon
description:
Arcadia 's best treasure hunter Luke is a dungeon hunter to prevent the resurrection of the Evil! We invite you to the world, which is filled with interesting stories, encounters with friends, action games that will defeat invulnerable monsters and use various elements to get through the dungeons.

A classic action movie with side scrolling and all the characteristics of a modern game.Make your way with your sword through the ranks of the most terrible opponents.Explore a huge world, find items and potions that will help you deal with your opponents.Upgrade your weapons. Find a map with key markers to make your adventure easier. An incredible array of cute and scary characters come to life with traditional 2D frame-by-frame animation.
Dozens of enemies and epic bosses!
